title: Forbidden Pool (4R120)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 6T, each Ring-bound Man takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. Fellowship: Add (2) and discard this condition to heal a Ring-bound Man.
Lore:	”'…tonight you have come where it is death to come.'”
Rarity:	R
